CHAT.comment: SPRINT/UNITED MANAGEMENT COMPANY, Petitioner v. ELLEN MENDELSOHN.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 10:05 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF PAUL W. CANE, JR., ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
<Opening argument by Gregory G. Garre on behalf of the United States, as amicus curiae>
OPENING ARGUMENT BY GREGORY G. GARRE ON BEHALF OF THE UNITED STATES AS AMICUS CURIAE
ORAL ARGUMENT OF DENNIS E. EGAN ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENT
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF PAUL W. CANE, JR., ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
(Whereupon, at 11:07 a.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
